name: Pixel Bomberman
description:
Are you fan of 1997 Atomic Bomber legendary 2D game?! Are you tired of thousands of high quality realistic FPS games and RPG games? Do you love tactic games? So, this is for you! New version of tactical battle between bombermans and AI enemies! 

Features:

Local Multiplayer - 2 players can play on same PC

Singleplayer

upcoming Server Multiplayer

Easy and funny

This game was made in few games and will get new updates with new maps and characters maybe in few months! Have fun!
